pt_br.name: Quadros de fotos

pt_br.description: Quadros para foto são estruturas para exibir fotografias, permitindo que as pessoas mostrem suas memórias e estilo pessoal.

en.name: Photo Frames
en.origin: DONATED BY BASTIÃO SABINO AND DONA CRISTINA
en.description: Photo frames are structures designed to display photographs or other artwork, serving as a popular form of decoration. They allow people to showcase memories, creativity, and personal style.
